summary: This is an email chain from attorney Jack Scarola regarding preparations for a video interview with a witness (referred to as 'V1'). It includes a list of persons with whom V1 interacted in connection with Jeffrey Epstein, detailing various contacts and observations at Epstein's Palm Beach residence.

persons.name: Jack Scarola
persons.context: Attorney sending the email, organizing a video meeting for a witness interview, and providing a list of persons the witness interacted with regarding Epstein.

persons.name: Mike
persons.context: Mentioned as being with Jack Scarola in a conference room for the upcoming video meeting; appears to be involved in the legal proceedings.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Met V1 about 10 times at Epstein's house; V1 saw nude photos of her and she acted like a secretary making appointments.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Central figure; V1 saw him over 100 times, was naked with him several times, and describes activities at his Palm Beach residence.

persons.name: Mary McCann
persons.context: Cc'd on an email in the chain regarding scheduling the witness interview.

connections.description: V1 saw Epstein over 100 times, was naked with him several times, and was brought to his house by his drivers about 50 times.
V1 met Maxwell about 10 times at Epstein's house, saw nude photos of her, and Maxwell acted as a secretary making appointments.
Scarola is organizing a video interview for V1 and providing a list of her contacts to assist in the interview.
Maxwell is described as acting like a secretary for Epstein, making appointments and arrangements.

events.title: Scheduled Video Interview
events.description: A video conference interview is scheduled for V1, organized by attorney Jack Scarola, to discuss her contacts with Epstein.

keyFacts: V1 interacted with Jeffrey Epstein over 100 times and was naked with him several times at his Palm Beach residence.
Ghislaine Maxwell met V1 about 10 times at Epstein's house, and V1 saw nude photos of Maxwell; Maxwell acted as a secretary making appointments.
V1 was picked up by Epstein's male drivers about 50 times and brought to his house.
V1 observed two housekeeping couples at Epstein's residence, with one couple quitting because they did not want to be there.
The document is an attorney-client communication preparing for a witness interview, indicating ongoing legal proceedings related to Epstein in July 2020.
